channel.title: Hair through helm? server bug
channel.description:
im using a source and idk how to fix that, when i wield a helm my head shows through my helm any fix for this?
rep ++ for the one that helps me

item.title: Hair through helm? server bug
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

You need to put the item ID of your helmet in the hat AND fullHelm arrays. This equips it to the head slot AND renders hair and beards invisible.

You will find this in your Item.java (depending on the source), and if not, it will be fullMask.

Read full topic
